detail_desc: WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Shirt in an airy, patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in a cotton weave. V-neck shirt with a collar, gathered shoulder seams and long, cuffed sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 37-45 cm.
Pleated skirt woven in a sturdy viscose blend with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2-10Y) and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
Short-sleeved viscose top with fringing at the front.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and slim legs.
Joggers in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing with a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details.
Bohemian top in a crinkled weave with elastication at the top and hem, decorative buttons at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front,and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard-weave viscose blend with a V-neck and smocking at the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted top in fast-drying, functional fabric with short sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Belt in a nylon weave with metal D-rings and metal clips at the ends. Width 3.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Calf-length skirt in a chiffon crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and tiered flounces. Satin underskirt.
Ankle-length trousers in a textured weave with a regular elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Wide yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a back partially in mesh. Opening with ties at the back.
Straight-cut top in a soft weave with lace at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem with a wide lace trim. Slightly longer at the back.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a seam at the waist. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fitted, scoop-necked T-shirt in stretch jersey with a sheen.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, frill-trimmed neckline and long, wide sleeves. Elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined front.
Boxy-style shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
V-neck blouse in airy cotton with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, boxy blouse in viscose crêpe jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves.
Double-breasted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gently tapered waist, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Round-neck jumper in a sturdy, fine knit with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, high-waisted skirt in washed denim with a metal carabiner hook at the top and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, back pockets, an asymmetric hem and short slit at the back.
Jersey body with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned weave with buttons at the top of the back. Gathered yoke with a lace trim at the front and short, lace-trimmed butterfly sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Pea coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a collar, decorative shoulder tabs and loose yoke at the back. Detachable belt with a plastic fastener at the waist, an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting over the thighs for a fitted silhouette.
Lightly padded, thermal jacket with print motifs and appliqués. Stand-up collar, a detachable hood with a hook and loop fastening, a zip down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets. Lined.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, rib-knit alpaca blend with beaded embroidery at the front, and around the neckline and cuffs. Long balloon sleeves with wide, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline and lace yoke at the top.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and reversible sequin panels down the sides of the legs (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Soft brushed inside.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Deck shoes in leather with lacing at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and soles with a sturdy grip.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow tie at the top and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Sewn-on waistcoat in woven fabric with a decorative chest pocket and buttons down the front.
Lightly padded hat in jersey with a felt appliqué at the top and elastication around the edge.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake side pockets.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Push-up bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with triangular, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and en elasticated hem. The polyamide in the bra is partly recycled.
Knee-length jersey dress with a round neckline with an opening and button at the top, and decorative pleats at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
A-line coat in soft, felted fabric with a detachable, lined hood, buttons at the front, a yoke front and back and patch front pockets. Lined.
Double-layered tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with inset lace trims, a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining at the top.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the front of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a low-cut back with crossover straps. Glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, ribbed, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.
Bibs in water-repellent material with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the neck and a spill pocket at the bottom.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.
Soft cotton jersey T-shirts in various designs.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with embroidery and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with ties. V-neck with buttons at the front, decorative gathers at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck with sewn-in lacing at the front and a low-cut back.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
